commands.gtnh: Responds with the crafting recipe of the furnace
commands.poll: Displays the current Poll, and adds reactions
commands.link: Provides the link to the github Repo
commands.newPoll: formatted like (TITLE, OPTION 1, OPTION 2) then saves that poll
commands.flip: Provides a 1 or 2, if you want to flip a coin
commands.status: Provides the current version of the pack
commands.setStatus: formatted like (STATUS), then saves the status
